text: Va ʙarojamon dar in dunjo va dar saroi oxirat nekī muqarrar farmo, [ki] ʙe tardid, mo ʙa sūji Tu ʙozgaştem». [Alloh taolo] Farmud: «Azoʙamro ʙa har ki ʙixoham merasonam va rahmatam hama cizro faro giriftaast, pas, onro ʙaroi kasone muqarrar xoham doşt, ki parvo peşa mekunand va zakot medihand va [hamcunin] ʙaroi kasone, ki ʙa ojoti mo imon meovarand
